00092 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 //
00094 // CLASS: uvm_factory_rep
00095 //
00096 // Internal implementation class.
00097 // uvm_factory delegetates to this class to do the real work.
00098 //
00099 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 
00106 class uvm_factory_rep {
00107 public:
00108   uvm_factory_rep();
00109   ~uvm_factory_rep();
00110   //
00111   int register_class_creator(
00112     const string & type_name, 
00113     uvm_creator* creator
00114   );
00115   int register_component_creator(
00116     const string & type_name,
00117     uvm_component_creator* creator
00118   );
00119   //
00120   uvm_object* create_uvm_object(
00121     string type_name,
00122     string inst_path = "",
00123     string name = "",
00124     bool no_overrides = false
00125   );
00126   uvm_component* create_component(
00127     string type_name,
00128     string inst_path = "",
00129     string name = ""
00130   );
00131   void* create_registered_class(
00132     const std::string & type_name
00133   );
00134   //
00135   void set_type_override(
00136     string original_type_name,
00137     string replacement_type_name,
00138     bool replace
00139   );
00140   void set_inst_override(
00141     string inst_path,
00142     string original_type_name,
00143     string replacement_type_name
00144   );
00145   //
00146   string get_type_override(string type_name);
00147   string get_inst_override(string type_name, string inst_path);
00148   string get_override(string type_name, string inst_path);
00149   void print_all_overrides(); // for debugging use
00150   void print_registered_types();
00151   void print_type_overrides();
00152   void print_inst_overrides();
00153   //
00154   bool is_component_registered(const string & type_name);
00155   bool is_uvm_object_registered(const string & type_name);
00156   bool is_class_registered(const string & type_name);
00157 protected:
00158   sc_strhash<uvm_creator*> creator_map;
00159   sc_strhash<string*> type_overrides;
00160 };

00162 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 // uvm_factory_rep implementation 
00164 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 
00166 uvm_factory_rep::uvm_factory_rep() {
00167 }
00168 
00169 uvm_factory_rep::~uvm_factory_rep() {
00170 }
00171 
00172 int uvm_factory_rep::register_class_creator(
00173   const string & type_name,
00174   uvm_creator* creator
00175 ) { 
00176   creator_map.insert(strdup(type_name.c_str()), creator);
00177   return 1;
00178 }
00179 
00180 // return NULL if object cannot be created
00181 
00182 uvm_object* uvm_factory_rep::create_uvm_object(
00183   string type_name,
00184   string inst_path,
00185   string name,
00186   bool no_overrides
00187 ) { 
00188   string typ;
00189   if (no_overrides) {
00190     typ = type_name;
00191   } else {
00192     string path = inst_path;
00193     if (name != "") {
00194       path = path + string(".") + name;
00195     }
00196     typ = get_override(type_name,path);
00197   }
00198   uvm_creator* c = creator_map[typ.c_str()];  
00199   if (!c) { 
00200     char msg[1024];
00201     sprintf(msg," Type = %s",typ.c_str());
00202     SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_,msg);
00203     return 0; 
00204   }
00205   uvm_object_creator* cobj = c->as_object_creator();
00206   if (!cobj) { 
00207     char msg[1024];
00208     sprintf(msg," Type = %s",typ.c_str());
00209     SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_OBJECT_,msg);
00210     return 0; 
00211   }
00212   uvm_object* obj = cobj->create(name);
00213   return obj;
00214 }
00215 
00216 string uvm_factory_rep::get_type_override(string type_name) {
00217   string* t = type_overrides[type_name.c_str()];
00218   if (!t) return "";
00219   return *t;
00220 }
00221 
00222 string uvm_factory_rep::get_inst_override(string type_name, string inst_path) {
00223   string typ = "";
00224 
00225   uvm_config_db<string>::get(INST_OVERRIDE_CNTXT, inst_path, type_name, typ);
00226   return typ;
00227 }
00228 
00229 string uvm_factory_rep::get_override(string type_name, string inst_path) {
00230   string typ = "";
00231   typ = get_inst_override(type_name,inst_path);
00232   if (typ.length()) {
00233     return typ;
00234   }
00235   typ = get_type_override(type_name);
00236   if (typ.length()) {
00237     return typ;
00238   }
00239   return type_name;
00240 }
00241 
00242 // return NULL if component cannot be created
00243 
00244 uvm_component* uvm_factory_rep::create_component(
00245   string type_name,
00246   string inst_path,
00247   string name
00248 ) { 
00249   string path = inst_path + string(".") + name;
00250   string typ = get_override(type_name,path);
00251   uvm_creator* c = creator_map[typ.c_str()];  
00252   if (!c) { 
00253     char msg[1024];
00254     sprintf(msg," Type = %s",typ.c_str());
00255     SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_,msg);
00256     return 0; 
00257   }
00258   uvm_component_creator* ccomp = c->as_component_creator();
00259   if (!ccomp) { 
00260     char msg[1024];
00261     sprintf(msg," Type = %s",typ.c_str());
00262     SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_COMP_,msg);
00263     return 0; 
00264   }
00265   uvm_component* comp = ccomp->create(name);
00266   return comp;
00267 }
00268 
00269 // if replacement type has not been registered with factory,
00270 // then error out.
00271 // if "replace" is false, and override already exists for 
00272 // "original_type_name", then error out
00273 
00274 void uvm_factory_rep::set_type_override(
00275   string original_type_name,
00276   string replacement_type_name,
00277   bool replace
00278 ) {
00279   // check replace_ment_type_name is registered
00280   if (!creator_map[(char*)(replacement_type_name.c_str())]) {
00281     char msg[1024];
00282     sprintf(msg,
00283       " Problem with replacement type in set_type_override. Type = %s",
00284       replacement_type_name.c_str()
00285     );
00286     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_,msg);
00287     return; 
00288   }
00289   if (!replace && type_overrides[(char*)(original_type_name.c_str())]) {
00290     char msg[1024];
00291     sprintf(msg," Type = %s", original_type_name.c_str());
00292     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_OVERRIDE_EXISTS_,msg);
00293     return;
00294   }
00295   type_overrides.insert(
00296     strdup(original_type_name.c_str()), 
00297     new string(replacement_type_name)
00298   );
00299 }
00300 
00301 // if replacement type has not been registered with factory,
00302 // then error out.
00303 
00304 void uvm_factory_rep::set_inst_override(
00305   string inst_path,
00306   string original_type_name,
00307   string replacement_type_name
00308 ) {
00309   // check replace_ment_type_name is registered
00310   if (!creator_map[(char*)(replacement_type_name.c_str())]) {
00311     char msg[1024];
00312     sprintf(msg,
00313       " Problem with replacement type in set_inst_override. Type = %s",
00314       replacement_type_name.c_str()
00315     );
00316     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_,msg);
00317     return; 
00318   }
00319 
00320   uvm_config_db<string>::set(INST_OVERRIDE_CNTXT, inst_path, original_type_name, replacement_type_name);
00321 }
00322  
00323 void uvm_factory_rep::print_all_overrides() {
00324   print_registered_types();
00325   print_type_overrides();
00326   print_inst_overrides();
00327 }
00328 
00329 void* uvm_factory_rep::create_registered_class(
00330   const string & type_name
00331 ) { 
00332   uvm_creator* c = creator_map[type_name.c_str()];  
00333   if (!c) { 
00334     char msg[1024];
00335     sprintf(msg," Type = %s",type_name.c_str());
00336     SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_CREATOR_NOT_FOUND_,msg);
00337     return 0; 
00338   }
00339   void* obj = c->create_class(type_name);
00340   return obj;
00341 }
00342 
00343 void uvm_factory_rep::print_registered_types() {
00344   cerr << "UVM_FACTORY REGISTERED TYPES:" << endl;
00345   sc_strhash_iter<uvm_creator*> iter(creator_map);
00346   while (!iter.empty()) {
00347     const char* c = iter.key();
00348     cerr << c << endl;
00349     iter++;
00350   }
00351   cerr << endl << endl;
00352 }
00353 
00354 void uvm_factory_rep::print_type_overrides() {
00355   cerr << "UVM_FACTORY REGISTERED TYPES:" << endl;
00356   sc_strhash_iter<string*> iter(type_overrides);
00357   while (!iter.empty()) {
00358     const char* orig = iter.key();
00359     string* repl = iter.contents();
00360     cerr << orig << " --> " << *repl << endl;
00361     iter++;
00362   }
00363   cerr << endl << endl;
00364 }

00372     uvm_config_item_string* item_s = item->as_string();
00373     cerr << item_s->m_instname << " " << item_s->m_field 
00374       << " --> " << item_s->value() << endl; 
00375   }

00378 
00379 bool uvm_factory_rep::is_class_registered(const string & type_name) {
00380   uvm_creator* c = creator_map[type_name.c_str()];
00381   if (c) {
00382     return true;
00383   }
00384   return false;
00385 }
00386 
00387 bool uvm_factory_rep::is_component_registered(const string & type_name) {
00388   uvm_creator* c = creator_map[type_name.c_str()];
00389   if (c) {
00390     uvm_component_creator* ccomp = c->as_component_creator();
00391     if (ccomp) return true;
00392   }
00393   return false;
00394 }
00395 
00396 bool uvm_factory_rep::is_uvm_object_registered(const string & type_name) {
00397   uvm_creator* c = creator_map[type_name.c_str()];
00398   if (c) {
00399     uvm_object_creator* cobj = c->as_object_creator();
00400     if (cobj) return true;
00401   }
00402   return false;
00403 }

00413 int uvm_factory::register_class_creator(
00414   const string & type_name,
00415   uvm_creator* creator
00416 ) {
00417   if (!m_rep) m_rep = new uvm_factory_rep();
00418   int r = m_rep->register_class_creator(
00419     type_name,
00420     creator
00421   );
00422   return r;
00423 }
00424 
00425 int uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator(
00426   const string & type_name,
00427   uvm_object_creator* creator
00428 ) {
00429   return register_class_creator(type_name, creator);
00430 }
00431 
00432 int uvm_factory::register_component_creator(
00433   const string & type_name,
00434   uvm_component_creator* creator
00435 ) {
00436   return register_class_creator(type_name, creator);
00437 }

00447     type_name,
00448     inst_path,
00449     name,
00450     no_overrides
00451   );
00452   return obj;
00453 }
